short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate selected text on web page in google translate

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you are want to translate some text on web page you just can right click on this text and choose "translate" and google translate site will be opened and your phrase will be translated.
